# title

**Instance Property**

The title that the picker’s item displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get set }
```

## Managing the Picker Item’s Data

- **subtitle**: The subtitle that the picker’s item displays.
- **summary**: The summary that the picker’s item displays.

items.description: The subtitle that the picker’s item displays.
items.name: subtitle

items.description: The summary that the picker’s item displays.
items.name: summary

title: title
